---
title: "First ANOVA Test comparing (numerical vs catagorical)"
format: html

---

```{r}


LM01 <- lm(`Pollinating visits by B. terrestris (visits/flower/10 min)`~Population,
           data = bumbledata)
summary(LM01)

anova(LM01)

library(agricolae)
hsd <- agricolae::HSD.test(LM01, "Population")
hsd$groups

#Difference between populations exists. Specifically 

AOV01 <- aov(`Pollinating visits by B. terrestris (visits/flower/10 min)`~Population,
           data = bumbledata)
hsd02 <-TukeyHSD(AOV01, "Population")

t1 <- hsd02$Population

t1 <- as.data.frame(t1)
tf <- t1$`p adj` < 0.05
which(tf)

row.names(t1)[tf]

#Compare populations

```
